home.title: Introduction
home.description: Start your journey with Helperbird with our simple guide on getting started, logging in, and exploring key features. We've made it easy to get up and running in no time.

home.title: My Account
home.description: This section helps you manage your Helperbird account. You'll find guides on updating your email, credit card, and subscription details.

home.title: iPhone & iPad
home.description: This section helps you to get up and running with Helperbird for iPhone & iPad. You'll find guides on downloading Helperbird, unlocking features and more.

home.title: Admin Features
home.description: This section assists IT administrators and managers with common tasks, including handling installations and managing permissions.

home.title: Writing features
home.description: Enhance your writing skills with ease using Helperbird's writing features.

home.title: Reading features
home.description: Unlock the power of Helperbird's reading features with our straightforward guide to enhance your reading experience.

home.title: Accessibility features
home.description: Explore the accessibility features of Helperbird in an easy-to-understand guide for a more inclusive online experience.

home.title: Admin tools
home.description: Effortlessly manage and optimize Helperbird with our user-friendly guide to admin tools.

home.title: Staying in touch
home.description: Discover effective ways to stay connected and informed with Helperbird.

home.title: FAQ
home.description: Get quick answers to your Helperbird questions in plain language with our FAQ guide.

home.title: Trouble shooting
home.description: Fix common Helperbird problems easily with our straightforward troubleshooting guide.
